This module implements helpers for making views.

Imports

../app, ../private/dom, ../private/strutils, ../private/utils

Types

  importId*: kstring
  matcher*: GrimoireMatcher
  matchSolvedOpt*: Opt[bool]
  matchedEntryIds*: seq[int16]
  solvedEntryIds*: set[int16]
  pageIndex*: int
  entryId*: int16
